testcase.name: Verify if user can create a new address
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the "chrome" browser.......................................passed Given user enters the url "http://automationpractice.com/index.php".........passed Given user is on the application login page.................................passed And user clicks on Sign in link.............................................passed And an existing user enters an email address as "testuser789@gmail.com".....passed And an existing user enters an password as "windows@123"....................passed And existing user clicks on SignIn button...................................passed Then user lands on the My Account page......................................passed And user clicks on My Addresses menu........................................passed And user clicks on Add a new Addresses button...............................passed And user enters Address as "Street 1".......................................passed And user enters City as "Romulus"...........................................passed And user selects State as "Alabama".........................................passed And user enters ZipCode as "35006"..........................................passed And user selects Country as "United States".................................passed And user enters Homephone as "545454545"....................................passed And user enters Mobilephone as "989898989"..................................passed And user clicks on the Save button..........................................passed Then user navigates to the My Addresses page and "MY ADDRESSES" text is displayed to the user.passed
